message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product for a price of $11,500. I believe it's a fair offer considering its value.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway and pay a premium for the product, but I'd like to try to get a better deal.
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $9,500 is too low for this product. I'm willing to come down a bit to $11,000. This is my final offer.

I appreciate your willingness to come down, but $11,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer $10,500. I'm getting close to walking away, but I really like the product and would like to make a deal.
